body: Hi Ben, That's exactly why we added the defaultFolder_ input to Ladybug_Ladybug for the new release. Just set it to another folder on your system with no white space and it should work fine. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/5uACgY*tajvfrZEICdakT-ibyWC7OsAOZigL3NsTyrVb9O1A1UTUNsvqj9gG64r-8YAIja6Oi1-HsTSScXBDQutBtgHDAZec/defaultFolder.png) Welcome to the camp! Mostapha
